name: Clinquest
overview: Clinquest Inc., a healthcare product development company, operates as a specialty contract and service provider that specializes in consulting services for drug discovery and development, implementation, post-approval, and compound partnering programs for pharmaceutical, biotechnology, biomedical device, and medical data industries. It offers drug development consulting services, such as nonclinical development, clinical development, CMC product development, project management, regulatory strategy, and quality assurance. The companyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s clinical trial implementation services include clinical project management and medical monitoring, biostatistical, data management, clinical site monitoring, data monitoring and clinical endpoint committees, clinical pharmacovigilance, medical writing, clinical quality assurance, site selection, and subject recruitment and retention. It also offers drug safety surveillance services, such as post-marketed pharmocovigilance and medical information. The company was incorporated in 1998 and is headquartered in Hudson, Massachusetts. Clinquest Inc. operates as a subsidiary of Clinquest Group BV.
